channel.title: Help with nullers please?
channel.description:
well, It has just come to my conclusion that you can easily null with certain symbols in your name.. no like "$" or "~" but i've seen people null with the (copy right) symbol and other things like that.
is the only way to block that... through what blocked "$" ? or..?
and another thing.. people come on cheat clients with names like "awf h2398fh 2i alwehfu" anyway i can make the character name 12 letters/numbers ?

item.title: Help with nullers please?
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

lesterknome:

Listen. This is not a spoon feeding community. Everyone here assumes you know java. We all learned the hard way so why shouldn’t you? We gave you a method, and expect you know enough to implement it into your code.

I started coding in july, and have been coding since. I’m not that experienced. This is the “help” section… not the “i know everything about java” section.

well… you had to learn somewhere? I know you started out with the same questions. am i right?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with nullers please?
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:6, topic:301292”][quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=397598.msg2951635#msg2951635 date=1252544860]
regex is kewl: username.replaceAll("\\W", "");
[/quote]

its playerName, and was it in String :D.

Bai Bai see you in another year :([/quote]ITS NOT NECESSARILY PLAYERNAME, YOU CAN RENAME VARIABLES YOU KNOW? I USED USERNAME AS A GENERIC NAME SO EVERYONE WOULD UNDERSTAND ME

edit: lesterknowme, stop acting 'sif you know anything

Read full topic

item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

item.title: Help with nullers please?
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

no…

in the login block, after the username string (assuming you are emulating client revision 317 server) has been read, invoke:

playerName.replaceAll("\\W");

this is why i never visit these forums. ill be back in another year

Read full topic

item.title: Help with nullers please?

item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

do you have a tut on that?

sorry. Never had to deal with this crap until now.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2009, 07:13:15 pm[/size][hr]so i’m guessing i would put that here?

if (charFileFound == false) { misc.println(playerName + ": character file not found."); return 0;
